hr.fer.zemris.webapps.blog.servlets.forms

Class Form

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.webapps.blog.servlets.forms.Form
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlogCommentForm, BlogEntryForm, LoginForm, RegistrationForm

    public abstract class Form
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract form that matches the web-representation of a domain object.
    Every attribute of the domain object should be represented as a String.
    Following features are available:
    • Filling the form from an HTTP request using fillFromHttpReq(HttpServletRequest)
    • Validating if the constraints of the attributes are met using validate()
    Author:
    Dan

        public boolean anyErrors()
        Checks are there any errors in this Form.
        Returns:
